title: Inflation rate in Germany 2024
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has increased over the Year.

Inflation rate compared to previous year is gradually increasing from 1988 to 1989, roughly constant from 1989 to 1990, slightly increasing from 1990 to 1991, roughly constant from 1991 to 1993, and lastly slightly decreasing from 1993 to 1994.
The line rapidly increased by 118.9% from Year 1988 to 1989.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 1993 and 1994.
Maximum Inflation rate compared to previous year, about 5.05 was reported at Year 1992
Minimum Inflation rate compared to previous year about 1.27 was reached at Year 1988
min_summary: In general Inflation rate compared to previous year has rose over the Year.

Inflation rate compared to previous year is gradually increasing from 1988 to 1989, roughly constant from 1989 to 1990, slightly increasing from 1990 to 1991, roughly constant from 1991 to 1993, and lastly slightly decreasing from 1993 to 1994.
